name: Museum Heist (itch) (Echo_Fnet)
description: You are a security guard and have to tranquilize an art thief. You can tag people by right clicking on them but you have a limited amount of ammunition so try not shoot the wrong target . When the thief has stolen  the required amount of art they will attempt to leave through the door and if they make it you will be fired.  This game was made for the 8 bit to infinity mouse only game jam 2 (mouse only restriction) and was made in 10 days using construct 3. This game can only be played on a computer due to the time restriction. Try stop the thief from stealing our art,  good luck and have fun
